text:
someone on my linkedin posted this:
```It appears because of the current political environment that everything is going to Hell; however, it is also observed that Hell is not Pareto optimal. This is a consequence of it being a universe that is part of the multiverse and just separated from our universe by an event horizon. Therefore, Hell is an asymptotic projection of the Calabi-Yau manifold manifesting itself in Anti-de-Sitter space and created as part of the big bang, Guth cosmic inflation and loaded with dark energy: it is expanding. If Hell is expanding at a slower rate than the rate at which everything is going to Hell, then the temperature and pressure in Hell will increase until all Hell breaks loose. However, if Hell is expanding at a rate faster than everything is going to Hell, then the temperature and pressure will drop until Hell freezes over. Therefore, if you are planning to go to Hell, for any reason (vacation, business, retirement, etc.) do it quickly before hell becomes non-functional: a political entity. ```

elements.text: someone on my linkedin posted this:

It appears because of the current political environment that everything is going to Hell; however, it is also observed that Hell is not Pareto optimal. This is a consequence of it being a universe that is part of the multiverse and just separated from our universe by an event horizon. Therefore, Hell is an asymptotic projection of the Calabi-Yau manifold manifesting itself in Anti-de-Sitter space and created as part of the big bang, Guth cosmic inflation and loaded with dark energy: it is expanding. If Hell is expanding at a slower rate than the rate at which everything is going to Hell, then the temperature and pressure in Hell will increase until all Hell breaks loose. However, if Hell is expanding at a rate faster than everything is going to Hell, then the temperature and pressure will drop until Hell freezes over. Therefore, if you are planning to go to Hell, for any reason (vacation, business, retirement, etc.) do it quickly before hell becomes non-functional: a political entity.

text: That read did not end up where I thought it would when I started.
